overview: After a viral video catapults her to the mayor’s office of her small town, Melanie Bridgewater soon finds herself in a fight against a shadowy government cabal seeking to make the United States more ‘globally compliant’. With the help of Benjamin Franklin’s time machine, she must travel to the age of George Washington in an attempt to remind America of the wonders of its own history and The Constitution.
tagline: A patriot must find her voice and save America.
title: No Time to Run
